title: Summary
text:
Full-stack engineer with 9+ years across SaaS, marketplace, ad-tech, and social products.
Heavy hands-on with JavaScript & TypeScript.
Cut load time 65%, scaled throughput 10x, shipped 150k+ installs.

title: Typeface (2023–Present)
text:
Reduced JS bundle 65% via code-splitting.
Refactored WebSockets, eliminating error spikes.
Shipped Canva plugin for major enterprise deal.

title: Houzz (2021–2023)
text:
Refactored home feed to TypeScript components.
Built unified search, lifting engagement.
Cut photo-page LCP with lazy hydration.

title: Yahoo (2017–2021)
text:
Shipped self-serve cohort-reporting tool.
Converted pipeline to async, halving report time.
Built React dashboard flagging anomalies.

title: Dcard (2013–2015)
text:
Re-architected MongoDB forum for 10x growth.
Doubled page views with modal viewer.
Deployed push notifications across AWS zones.

title: Sparks Lab & CHOCOLABS
text:
Published 4 Android apps (150k+ installs).
Won 2 national 1st-place awards.
Scaled backend users 1k → 10k with Express + MongoDB.
